Report.Name: דוח תקציב למנהל
Report.Versions: SELECT Version, [VersionID] As CategoryID FROM Versions

Query.Txt: Select Scenario as OScenario, isnull(Scenario,'לקוחות') As Scenario,dT,Sum(TermValue) As TermValue FROM p7v_Standards Where FrameID = @FrameID And VersionCategoryID = @VersionCategoryID1 Group By Scenario,dT

SELECT [נושא] + CASE ISNULL(DontShowTemplate,0) WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE CHAR(159) END As JobName ,[תאריך אסמכתא] As TDate ,[כמות]/4.333 As Q ,[סדר_שורות_משרות2008] As Ord FROM [BEBudget] b LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ReportComments WHERE Report=1 AND PageID=2 AND Comment IS NULL) c ON ISNULL(c.FrameCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.FrameCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.FrameCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.VersionCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.VersionCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.VersionCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.BudgetCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.BudgetCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.BudgetCategoryID END And ISNULL(c.JobCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.JobCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.JobCategoryID END LEFT OUTER JOIN Misrot_besqxl j on j.CategoryID=b.JobCategoryID WHere b.FrameCategoryID=@FrameID And isnull(c.DontShow,0)=0 AND b.VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 And b.BudgetCategoryID=229 And [מספר תבנית] < 100000000

Select Job,iSNULL(Name,job) + ' (' + shType + ')' As Name,Q,oRD,ColOrd,HourType From ( Select m.[משרות2008_-_1] as Job, שם as Name, [סוג העסקה] as shType, ISNULL([שעות שבועיות],[שעות חדשיות]/4.333) As Q,'ש"ע שבועיות' As HourType,m.סדר_שורות_משרות2008 as Ord,1 As ColOrd,DontShow From BEMPBudget p LEFT OUTER JOIN TemplateIndex t on t.TempltID=p.[מספר תבנית] LEFT OUTER JOIN (Select distinct VersionCategoryID,FrameCategoryID,[מספר תבנית],JobCategoryID From BEBudget Where VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 And FrameCategoryID=@FrameID) b on b.[מספר תבנית]=p.[מספר תבנית] LEFT OUTER JOIN Misrot_besqxl m on m.CategoryID=b.JobCategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ReportComments WHERE Report=1 AND PageID=3 AND BudgetCategoryID=229 AND Comment IS NULL) c ON ISNULL(c.FrameCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.FrameCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.FrameCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.VersionCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.VersionCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.VersionCategoryID END And ISNULL(c.JobCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.JobCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.JobCategoryID END Where t.VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 And b.FrameCategoryID=@FrameID And ISNULL(DontShow,0)=0 UNION ALL Select t.TempltSubject as Job, שם as Name, [סוג העסקה] as shType, [שעות חדשיות] As Q,'ש"ע חודשיות' As HourType,m.סדר_שורות_משרות2008 as Ord,2 As ColOrd,DontShow From BEMPBudget p LEFT OUTER JOIN TemplateIndex t on t.TempltID=p.[מספר תבנית] LEFT OUTER JOIN (Select distinct VersionCategoryID,FrameCategoryID,[מספר תבנית],JobCategoryID From BEBudget Where VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 And FrameCategoryID=@FrameID) b on b.[מספר תבנית]=p.[מספר תבנית] LEFT OUTER JOIN Misrot_besqxl m on m.CategoryID=b.JobCategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ReportComments WHERE Report=1 AND PageID=3 And BudgetCategoryID=229 AND Comment IS NULL) c ON ISNULL(c.FrameCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.FrameCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.FrameCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.VersionCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.VersionCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.VersionCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.JobCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.JobCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.JobCategoryID END Where t.VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 And b.FrameCategoryID=@FrameID) x Where Q!=0 AND isnull(DontShow,0)=0

SELECT Bud,DateValue As Tdate,S,Ord FROM ALLVersionDates a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT Case WHEN [תקציב_-_2]='מזון' AND b.FrameCategoryID in (8,9,366) THEN [תקציב_-_2] + '_' ELSE isnull([תקציב_-_3],[תקציב_-_2] + '_') END + CASE ISNULL(DontShowTemplate,0) WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE CHAR(159) END As Bud ,[תאריך אסמכתא] As TDate ,-סכום As S ,[סדר_שורות_תקציב] As Ord,b.versionCategoryID FROM [BEBudget] b LEFT OUTER JOIN BUDGET_besqxl d on d.CategoryID=b.BudgetCategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN TemplateIndex t on t.TempltID=b.[מספר תבנית] LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ReportComments WHERE Report=1 AND PageID=4 AND Comment IS NULL) c ON ISNULL(c.FrameCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.FrameCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.FrameCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.VersionCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.VersionCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.VersionCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.BudgetCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.BudgetCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.BudgetCategoryID END And ISNULL(c.JobCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.JobCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.JobCategoryID END Where b.FrameCategoryID=@FrameID And b.VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 AND ISNULL(DontShow,0)=0 And d.[תקציב_-_1]='הוצאות תפעול' And נושא='למנהל' And [מספר תבנית] < 100000000 And TempltBudget != 'שכר' + char(183) + 'שכר בסיסי') b ON b.VersionCategoryID=a.CategoryID AND a.DateValue = b.TDate WHERE a.CategoryID = @VersionCategoryID1

SELECT נושא + CASE ISNULL(DontShowTemplate,0) WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE CHAR(159) END As Bud,isnull(נושא,'השקעות_') As B1 ,DATEADD(month,MonthN,t.FirstDate) As TDate ,-סכום As S FROM p0t_Months m CROSS JOIN (SELECT FirstDate FROM Versions where VersionID=@VersionCategoryID1) t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM [BEBudget] Where FrameCategoryID=@FrameID And VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 And BudgetCategoryID=205 And [מספר תבנית] < 100000000) b on m.MonthN+1=DATEPART(MONTH,b.[תאריך אסמכתא]) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ReportComments WHERE Report=1 AND PageID=5 AND Comment IS NULL) c ON ISNULL(c.FrameCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.FrameCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.FrameCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.VersionCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.VersionCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.VersionCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.BudgetCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.BudgetCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.BudgetCategoryID END And ISNULL(c.JobCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.JobCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.JobCategoryID END Where ISNULL(DontShow,0)=0

SELECT נושא + CASE ISNULL(DontShowTemplate,0) WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE CHAR(159) END As Bud,isnull(נושא,'הצטידות_') As B1 ,DATEADD(month,MonthN,t.FirstDate) As TDate ,-סכום As S FROM p0t_Months m CROSS JOIN (SELECT FirstDate FROM Versions where VersionID=@VersionCategoryID1) t LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM [BEBudget] Where FrameCategoryID=@FrameID And VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 And BudgetCategoryID=446 And [מספר תבנית] < 100000000) b on m.MonthN+1=DATEPART(MONTH,b.[תאריך אסמכתא]) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ReportComments WHERE Report=1 AND PageID=5 AND Comment IS NULL) c ON ISNULL(c.FrameCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.FrameCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.FrameCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.VersionCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.VersionCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.VersionCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.BudgetCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.BudgetCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.BudgetCategoryID END And ISNULL(c.JobCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.JobCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.JobCategoryID END Where ISNULL(DontShow,0)=0

Report.Name: דוח תקציב פרויקטים גדולים
Report.Versions: SELECT Version, [VersionID] As CategoryID FROM Versions

Query.Txt: SELECT ISNULL([שירות_-_1],'') As Px1, CASE WHEN [שירות_-_3] IS NULL THEN [שירות_-_2] ELSE [שירות_-_3] END + CASE WHEN [נושא] IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ': ' + [נושא] END As Px2 ,DATEADD(month,MonthN,x.FirstDate) As TDate ,-סכום As S ,[סדר_שורות_שירות] As Ord FROM p0t_Months m CROSS JOIN (SELECT FirstDate FROM Versions where VersionID=@VersionCategoryID1) x LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM [BEBudget] Where BudgetCategoryID=206 And VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1 AND [מספר תבנית] < 100000000) b on m.MonthN+1=DATEPART(MONTH,b.[תאריך אסמכתא]) LEFT OUTER JOIN SHERUT_besqxl d on d.CategoryID=b.FrameCategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN TemplateIndex t on t.TempltID=b.[מספר תבנית] LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM ReportComments WHERE Report=2 AND PageID=1 AND Comment IS NULL) c ON ISNULL(c.FrameCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.FrameCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.FrameCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.VersionCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.VersionCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.VersionCategoryID END AND ISNULL(c.BudgetCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.BudgetCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.BudgetCategoryID END And ISNULL(c.JobCategoryID,0)=CASE WHEN c.JobCategoryID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.JobCategoryID END Where ISNULL(DontShow,0)=0

Report.Name: בנקים
Report.Versions: SELECT Version, [VersionID] As CategoryID FROM Versions

Query.Txt: SELECT [Service_1],[Service_2],[Service_3],[Q],[TransDate],[VersionCategoryID],[BudgetCategoryID],[TType],RowOrd,ColOrd FROM [p1v_Banks] WHERE BudgetCategoryID=192 AND VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1

SELECT [Service_1],[Service_2],[Service_3],[Q],[TransDate],[VersionCategoryID],[BudgetCategoryID],[TType],RowOrd,ColOrd FROM [p1v_Banks] WHERE BudgetCategoryID=191 AND VersionCategoryID=@VersionCategoryID1
